data.message: We all asking for a new album. I want as many CDs out before u retire which is hopefully never lol. Break some more world records. Top the charts more. Sale ouy more shows. Shit at least a new cd. It took u 5 yrs from encore to relapse and that's ur first retirement. If u don't release one this year thatd at least 4 years bro. Give us a CD "each march for these fucking retards" every year or every other year like u used to man.
